long_description: Enjoy full-leg warmth with your favorite skirt or dress in the nylon/merino wool/spandex Goodhew Herrington tights. Soft merino wool is blended with stretch nylon and spandex for durability and a good fit. Comfort waistband and flatlock stitching is soft against skin. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Enjoy full-leg warmth with your favorite skirt or dress in the nylon/merino wool/spandex Goodhew Herrington tights.
